department: Health Canada and Public Health Agency of Canada
short_summary: Amendment to closing time and competitive RFP for lead marketing and advertising creative agencies for Health Canada and Public Health Agency of Canada.
description: Full range of creative development and advertising-related services for Health Canada and Public Health Agency of Canada advertising and marketing campaigns.
full_summary:
### Health Canada and Public Health Agency Advertising Contract RFP

**Advertisement Title (both English and French)**

English | French
---------|---------
Health Canada and PHAC Advertising Contract RFP | Contrats publicitaires de Santé Canada et ASPC

### Background Information

-Public Health Agency, or your organization may be involved with, a two-year (with an option for three years) advertising contract and advertising agency partnership contract between the departments of Health Canada and the Public Health Agency of Canada. 

-Health Canada is looking to engage two (2) lead marketing and advertising creative agencies to work on various marketing campaigns. Each partnership is expected to contribute creative services to health campaigns.

-BIDS are closed. 

### Tender Details

-**Publication Date:** February 22, 2024
-**Next Opening:** Not specified
-**Bid Closing Date/Limit of Time:** March 28, 2024, at 2:00 EDT
-**Time (local):** Time is local.
-**Notice Number:** WS4449937272-Doc4452021262.
-**Contract Description:** This partnership is expected to supply marketing and advertising services for health campaigns, beginning from the contract award date to March 31, 2025, with the possibility of extending beyond the period.

### Major Points To Consider:

-Assess technical competencies of any marketing and advertising creative agency looking to join these talks with the government.
-Assess technical ability on marketing and advertising
-Proven past work portfolio and history.
-In learnt past partnership, how long have the same great works last?
-Long-standing work relationship
__.__No prescriptive, yet these points will partially measure your competitor on these particular and make informed decision to support or support your preference based on long-term or just ongoing.
